data.title: Former Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto, who heads the ruling Liberal Democratic Party's largest faction, gives his assent for Takao Fujii, a member of his faction, to challenge Prime Minister Junichi
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: TOKYO, Japan - Former Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto, who heads the ruling Liberal Democratic Party's largest faction, gives his assent for Takao Fujii, a member of his faction, to challenge Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi for the party presidency at a general meeting of the faction at a Tokyo hotel on Sept. 2. Kyodo) - JNHCGK from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
